title: The Color Wizard
description: A wizard with a very high nearsight prescription loses their glasses... they can't find their way, so maybe you could help?
highlights: Participating on 'Mini game a month' game jam of May 2024.
Wanted to create a story of a wizard that uses colors as their spells.
The game is set only in one screen, and the camera does not move. The player can see the whole map at all times.

title: Catastrophia
description: You're a cat in the midst of a robot-alien invasion. Survive 7 days while collecting food!
highlights: First place on the Patient73 2024 Game Jam.
Showcases how AI can help in the creation of games and concepts.

title: Demo: Shooter 2D
description: Short demo of a 2D shooter. Jump, shoot, bounce on platforms while eliminating enemy hordes. Get the keys to open next levels.
highlights: Course project, we had to think of mechanics by ourselves, apart from implementing some given to us.

title: Demo: Medical Showdown
description: Final project for my Higher Certificate. Small platformer game made in HTML Superpowers, an HTML game framework.
highlights: My first taste of game development.
